subtitle: Did you know The Pleiades, which is situated 440 thousand light-years from Earth,
is a vibrant stellar cluster commonly known as the seven sisters throughout the universe.
Colonized by humanoid refugees from the Mansys system near Vega who have interacted
and visited earthlings on earth, these ancient astronaut settlers arrived in colossal arks,
away from the orion lyran wars, millions of years ago in the 5th dimension and their
specific race represent three of the original four pleiadian racial groups:
Ahel, Noor, and Taal. Their mission was to terraform the first three planets of ten,
as the others were unfit for life. The system's desolation kept it hidden from the reptilian
Ciakhar Empire, making it an unattractive target. Advancing rapidly in interdimensional travel,
they ascended to the 5th density for protection, starting anew, free from centralized control.
The Pleiadians are often depicted as tall, elegant beings, standing between 7 to 9 feet tall. They
typically have fair, pale complexions, though some exhibit green or blue skin tones. Their
hair commonly ranges from long straight blonde to silver-white, and their facial
features bear resemblance to both Nordic people, and Asiatic indigenous Earth natives. Legend has
it that they traverse galaxies aboard ships of light, embodying a mysterious and advanced
civilization. Many in the past and present consider them as ambassadors of enlightenment,
attuned to the universe's symphony. They have relationships and many intermarriages with other
races from other planets. Throughout history, they've been intertwined with human consciousness,
mentioned in ancient stories and revered as guides of spiritual growth. Many have
communicated with them through mystical channels, receiving teachings beyond mortal
understanding. Their technology, is said to be incredibly advanced over a thousand years ahead,
hints at a comprehension of existence beyond our grasp. Legends tell of their influence on human
history, subtly shaping events alongside earthly civilizations. In the pursuit of
enlightenment, many of the various races of pleiadians are seen as symbols of hope,
urging individuals to rise above the mundane and embrace cosmic consciousness.
In the pleiadian havens known as the seven sisters, each
planet governs itself. Ahel and Taali planets have royal councils, while the Noori operate through an
assembly. They named their cluster "Manahai," symbolizing their ambition to start afresh,
reminiscent of their original world Mana from Lyran. Technologically, they're millennia ahead,
accessing antimatter dimensions, or what they term the anti-verse.
One faction settled around Alcyone, separate from those in Taygeta due to disputes over planetary
choices. Taali dissenters favored Erra over Temer, designated for Ahel, leading to their relocation.
Exposed to dominant galactic forces, they formed alliances with the Orion and Altair groups
out of necessity. But not all Pleiadeans are benevolent. The "Taal Shiar" aimed for dominion in
"Taali hara," but faced resistance from Orion and Ciakahrr empires, tarnishing their reputation.
Errahel, in the Taygeta system, stands as a beacon of peace and knowledge. Housing
civilization's archives, it supports diverse life across five climatic zones. Despite the distance,
travel from Errahel to Earth takes 14 thousand hours or just 4 hours with
warp speed. Predominantly Errahel played a crucial role in humanity's genetic history,
aiding Annunaki in early Earth experiments.
Erra is a warm and temperate planet sustaining a wide variety of life forms and bio zones. The
planets are mainly silicate. They imported many vegetal and animal species from their
home world Maya, recreating a natural bio habitat with five climates: tropical, tepid,
temperate, glacial, and polar. They have seasons, rain, and snow, luxuriant forests,
deep valleys, stunning coastlines, and numerous high mountain ranges.
It is a magnificent world; turquoise blue skies can be seen from space,
with seven moons laying across the horizons. This world is populated by the Ahel colony,
a pale-skinned, gray skinned and fair skinned, blue-eyed, blonde,
white or dark brown-haired race from Maya indistinguishable from Nordic Earthlings.
They are a spiritual race, cultivating arts serving attainment, inner peace,
and spiritual ascension, such as ethereal music, dance, visuals,
and lovemaking. Something very particular to the Ahel,
because of its natural photosensitivity adapted by their planet Ashaara as well as genetic heritage,
is their skin being exceptionally sensitive to sensual touch. The Pleiadians distinguish,
in the act of love, reproductive function from transfiguration of consciousness.
Many of their advanced floating sky cities are in the skies of Ashaara,
shimmering like glowing crystal white cities with large landmasses of green nature,
flying birds, and extravagant architecture reminiscent of futuristic Greek cities.
There is a part in their brain that activates puberty, and they can switch it on at will to
stimulate the epidermis receptor cells. Regarding entwined soul ascension,
all aspects of the being are enthused: the physical, symbolized by the skin,
and the internal, which is the genital connexon. The mental emotional aspect
of love, and spiritual energy if vibrational elevation in frequency.
These three aspects combined allow them to reach higher realms of pure connection with mother and
father consciousness, transcending densities as high as the 13th density source. In this attained
state of bliss, they are only pure disembodied, universal, and omnipresent infinite consciousness.
Concerning procreation, Pleiadians choose to perform it at the same moment or not,
knowing that combining both is a very special moment in one's life,
when the highest realms of ecstasy are embraced, the ultimate condition to ignite an impulse for
the binding of a soul into a new incarnation. For reasons of practicality, they have also developed
the option of artificial conception in life pods, but they usually choose the natural way.
Concerning education, there are schools of specification. Each
new child's abilities are identified and enticed to develop at their possibilities,
in order for the being to achieve their mission and aspirations.
Most youngsters are regrouped into specific schools of learning regarding
their common talents. Their favorite leisure is to spend time outdoors,
as well as gather for social entertainments such as games or artistic activities including
concerts. Pleiadians are not into competitive sports like Earthlings. They believe that the
best way to attain improvement is through personal development and not by competitive comparison.
We have a vegetal alimentation. The race, Ahel, is based on an organic life form,
but there is an upper class called "the elders" who choose not to incarnate because they passed
a certain level of evolution. It is said the elders can wander out of their body at will,
and return to it, being forever linked. They ingest vegetal ailments, primordial components,
and energized water. The energized water is drunk when traveling, to allow their body
to shift at will while not having to deal with food evacuation. Pleiadians have the choice for
solid meal when not performing space travels. The major rule they live by is ingesting food that has
no heart and no face. Otherwise, eating blood life forms lowers down the vibrational frequency.
Pleiadians believe they are not space relatives to humans on Earth. The only difference is they
were born somewhere else. They are not guardians of the planet, not like the Galactic Federation
of Worlds or Council of Five. They are not gods or what legends may know them as angels. Many
Pleiadians have left messages on Earth that they do not and should not be worshipped. They promote
spiritual evolution but are liberating fighters when necessary and most fight wars on many planets
under the Federation of Worlds. They wish that Earthlings will be able to join the Federation
of Worlds one day when they stop looking at each other as inferior, just like many races more
advanced than them currently they all had to start from primitive mindsets to more evolved mindsets.
Pleiadian views on life are that all life is immortal. That the soul is eternal, because
all life forms are a fractal of source. Each being is made of a substance that is part of the creator
of all known as the source, source will never die because source was never born. The source
is the great force that is love, other than this view they have no gods or idols like earthlings.
An Errahel scientist named Thor, was sent by the G.F.W. on earth with the US government back in the
1940s to advance their knowledge on hyperspace travel, this extraterrestrial can be found in
many recently released government documents where it is stated that many live on the planet
earthlings called Venus, and many of these beings visit earth like a vacation including himself.
When he came in contact with the US government, he was indistinguishable from the common man
except for his outfit that was made out of non earth elements. His goal was to speed up the
advancement of humans before the a new growing threat of the ciakarr empire. Unfortunately,
the US representatives and many foreign nations denied assistance from the federation of worlds.
When they were contacted in 1954, they fell to the habitual con of the empire. The US president
Eisenhower was warned about different life forms visiting earth some being pleasant and others not
at all. If they would have agreed for help, they would deactivate all weapons and would end all
wars which would cultivate spiritual evolution and the joining with the Galactic federation of
worlds. Pleiadians have an active program in assistance of the elevation of consciousness,
assisting in finding freedom from the oppressive servitude of the ciakarr empire and the orion
and altair groups who are the pleiadians that supported the Nazi party. As such,
they entice awareness opening through education, information and channelings
with spiritual mediums working through the high frequencies of the energy grid. Many
are also a part of the envoy program that involves incarnating into earth bodies to
perform groundwork more efficiently. This program on earth is known as starseeds.
Most cargo ships are made for long space travel and have cylindrical shapes. The patrol ships are
smaller and discoidal, the fleet decades have a more oblong profile. The third planet of the
ashaaru system is T-mar which is a smaller world than Erra but the administrative central for the
ashara system. Temperate and also luxuriant with nature, T-mar is more populated proportionally
than Erra. The T-marhu are the Taal colony from Omankhera. The complete Taal royal family who
used to reign over the man races had escaped as we know to the orion district and vanished into
oblivion. Hence, a new government was formed on T-mar from the union of a female royal descendant
and a military hero. The taali are cousins of the Ahil, with some differences, for instance
their alimentation; they are therefor, more to elevate their frequency into higher densities.
They are therefor, more vulnerable to lower frequency races such as reptilians and greys,
this is why they only choose to work in the background, especially in the military operations
on earth. Also, their spirituality is not based on sensitivity and sensuality like their cousins
Ahil, but on ascetic methods which gives off the impression of coldness. T-mari are involved with
the galactic federation. They do visit earth currently but have not established a distinct
colony. Their ships are discoidal, very similar to to the ahel ships. All three races, Noor,
Ahel and Taal share in the ashara system the same technology and engineering.
The 5th planet of the Ashaaru known as the Alkhorat meaning the serene place is
inhabited by the descendants of Noor colonies. The noori are of the same genetic root as the
Ahil but present some physiological differences. Notably their heights can reach up to 8 feet. The
Alkhori live long as the Ahil and Taali, that is to say between 500 to 700 thousand years
but a genetic alteration occurred due to the successive changes of habit conditions. The
noori people like to travel. This unfortunate alteration is such that their internal organs
fail as they not grow as fast their body envelops. In general, the heart fails.
Members of the G.F.W. as all Ashaari are Noor Pleiadians and they are involved in earth affairs.
They established colonies in ancient times in Norway; they were also known in legends
as the red hair giants alongside the Puxhity races. The D'Akoorhu reside on the 10th planet,
Dakoorat meaning the place of the guardians of peace. This is the fourth Ashaari race born from
a unique evolution of the Noor from Alkhorat. They are those who earthlings call Pleiadeans
of light. They are the highest level of evolution in the man race and they dwell
in the 9th density of existence on a world they transformed alongside with their elevation. It is
believed that this extraordinary development into light beings is due to the nature of Dakoorat,
an outward planet of the Asharri system, whose structure is crystalline and interacting
molecularly with the plasmic field of the cluster. Surpassing the restricted possibilities of the
altered Noori genetics, this colony transfigured their bodies into translucent ethereal envelopes,
allowing their lifespace to reach incredible records. They leave when they wish, when
they feel they have served their time serving the source and wish to merge back again with it. They
then regenerate and come back in a new existence for a new mission. The S'Akoori are wise and very
powerful, and they are part of the federation of worlds. They have tridimensional ethereal ships,
powered by geometrical resonance energy. Often seen as Lozenges or faceted prisms. Following
the Orion Wars, conflicts erupted in the Pleiades and on the once-thriving planet Maldek, situated
between Venus and Mars. Initially inhabited by peaceful Martians, Maldek fell victim to
the hostile expansionism of the Ciakarr Empire, resulting in widespread genocide. The Pleiadians
of Errahel intervened, driving the Empire back, but the Draconians unleashed a devastating planet
destroyer, laying waste to Maldek and its inhabitants. In a bid to preserve the lost
souls of Maldek, including the peaceful Martians, various civilizations, including the Pleiadians,
utilized advanced nano-technology and quantum mechanics to seed Earth with their essence.
Ancient texts and oral traditions, notably among Australian Aboriginal tribes, recount
the intervention of another group of Pleiadian hybrids who genetically influenced the Olmecs and
seeded early North American indigenous peoples, alongside the Annunaki royal family—known as the
Atlanteans. The Noori played a role in populating Scandinavia with Nordic people. Through alliances
and intermarriages with the Atlanteans of Nibiru, the Pleiadians and Naascals established a lineage
that encompassed all extraterrestrial races under the umbrella of the Annunaki.
Subsequently, many Pleiadians chose to depart Earth, while others retreated underground,
particularly to the subterranean city of Agartha,
in order to safeguard their lineage's purity. This prolonged subterranean existence is said
to have altered their appearance, giving their skin a green hue.
For more references on this topic, please purchase and read Elena Daanan's Gift from
the stars and alien races and check out more references and sources in the description.
